review_text: Mary place was a great get away on the lake. We had a family get together for the holiday. Very large space for my family and comfortable sleeping spaces. She had all the amenities we needed for our lunch and a very large table for our gathering. The living room faced the lake and it was a picture perfect day with the sun over the lake. Definitely word book again to experience all seasons.

Valerie is the absolute best host!! I stayed at her place for six months for work and her place made me feel right at home. Valerie is very responsive and excellent at communicating. Any questions or issues I had she answered and took care of immediately. I would highly recommend staying here and I hope to stay at her house again.
Valerie was a great host! Her home was very comfortable and welcoming. We highly enjoyed our stay.
Valerie is the best! Very kind, accommodating, and responsive!

Had a wonderful stay. Valerie was a gracious host and very responsive with good communication. Good location with easy access to our needs. I must say I really appreciated the good mattress. I’ve stayed in many different places where you sleep horribly because of uncomfortable mattress. Thank you for that. I would definitely stay again if I’m ever back in the area.

We loved our stay at Valerie's home! It was super cozy and close to Madison for a quick date night! It was also convenient that she allows pets! We got to bring our dog! We would definitely consider staying here again!
What a cozy little place! We felt right at home and loved that we could walk to the park & lake. Will definitely stay here again next time we’re in Beaver Dam!

We had a wonderful stay. The neighborhood is charming and gave us a strong sense of security. Although we arrived later than anticipated and couldn't savor the experience fully, we're eager to return for another stay. Highly recommended!
Val’s place was squeaky clean, easy to find, and easy to get in. We were very comfortable and enjoyed our family time!

Valerie's place was just the cozy place we needed after two long days racing at Trek Cup in Waterloo. Beds were comfy with plenty of pillows, kitchen was well-equipped, not much room in the freezer, but we didn't need a lot, and the bathroom was well equipped with all you could need. Nice little place!
Cute place, very clean and nice and centrally located!
Valerie was very nice and responsive! Place was very cute and centrally located, would definitely stay again!
Nice place in a very quiet peaceful neighborhood and hot made us cinnamon rolls that were waiting for us at check in... I highly recommend Valerie to any guests
Great place! Host was proactive with recommendations.
Very nice peaceful home.

Had a great stay in Beaver Dam at Valerie's place. The house was extremely clean and well furnished. It has been very recently remodeled and is like new inside. Communication with the host was excellent. The house is located in a very nice quiet residential area. We would stay here again.........A great place for breakfast is "Our House 2" with their homemade bacon and breakfast sausage. A good Friday night fish fry is "Bayside Superclub".
Great stay about 45 minutes from Oshkosh. Exactly as pictured and described. Valerie was very quick to respond when needed. Extremely elusive cat.

We greatly enjoyed our stay at Valerie’s place. Valerie was friendly and communicative and made us feel very much at home. Quiet residential setting close to a few restaurants and services and not too far away from downtown. A great value for us and we would stay here again! Thank you.

Valerie was quick to respond to any question. It was a very comfortable home with lots of space for the two of us to relax. The shower was fantastic! It definitely met our needs while we went to the EAA in Oshkosh for the week. Thanks, Valerie!

Valerie was very helpful when we unexpectedly had to travel to Beaver Dam for a family emergency. He place was very clean and comfortable. We appreciated her flexibility with us. Would stay there again!

Valerie, is a great host! We enjoyed our stay from beginning to end. She was quick to respond to any questions! House was very clean, spacious and comfy. Valerie, also was kind enough to have some snacks and drinks ready for our stay. We also enjoyed some great pizza & wings at Park Plaza!! Only 5min from our stay! Would highly recommend! If we are ever back in BeaverDam, we will definitely come back to stay at your place! Thanks Valerie!!

Valarie is a great host, willing to make extra accommodations for my grandkids. She offered extra kitchen amenities, providing all we needed on our vacation travels. I highly recommend her as your next host!
Great place and great host. Pretty good location. The house was nice and clean. Fully equipped kitchen and good internet. Favorite thing probably was the water pressure of the shower… amazing!

Valerie's place was very enjoyable. The unit is comfortable and all necessary amenities are available in the rooms, kitchen and bathroom. WiFi is fine and locked garage is provided for the car. We stayed for a week and did not lack anything. The unit is newly remodeled and everything works fine. .I will come back to it anyday. Valerie communicate well and was very helpful on enquiries. Valerie 's place was 'super'.

The cutest lake house with absolutely everything you could possibly need (including a goodie basket to welcome us). The kitchen is extremely well stocked for cooking, lots of fun yard and lake toys. Cute decor, plenty of space. We loved it!

The stay was an absolute dream. The home is in an incredible location and with everything you can imagine you would need. Lisa was so responsive, friendly and accommodating. Whilst on a work trip the home was a little heaven at the end of each day and couldnt recommend a break here enough!

We highly recommend Lisa's home!! She went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and was very responsive to questions and had great communication. The house was very clean and very well appointed. The walk down to the lake is easy and the dock was a perfect spot for fishing. We had a large family and the house was perfect for us. The bedrooms are on the opposite side of a large family room which worked out great. We had some night owls using the family room and you couldn't hear a thing from the bedrooms. Everything was just perfect and we are very grateful to have found Lisa's home for our family vacation!

Lisa's place was everything we wanted for our family get-together. Plenty of room to spread out and right by the lake, perfect for grilling and chilling. We appreciated all the amenities and Lisa's attentiveness to our needs. We'd love to come back again next year!

This grand old farmhouse has been updated, but the warmth has not been lost! Plenty to do, lots of relaxation to enjoy, plenty of room for our dozen adults and teenies.
Just the right distance from the towns needed for some support, but the lake house was a blast, with size and facility at its rural best!
Your new guests won't be sorry they chose this fine AirBnb! AAA+

Lisa has such a charming home with so many amenities! The house had everything we needed, including paper-ware, laundry, sunscreen and bug spray. We loved the beautiful location and spent most of our time out on the lake. The location is quiet and peaceful. Lisa responded quickly to any questions we had. We loved our time at Lisa’s!

I have never been to Wisconsin and had no idea what to expect. The pictures do not do this place justice. It was gorgeous. It was also one of the most well stocked Air B and Bs I have stayed in. My son randomly needed a sharpie, and there was a sharpie in a well organized drawer. Would stay here again and again.

This place was amazing! It was beautiful & incredibly peaceful with a great dock for fishing & comfortable deck overlooking the lake. The entire place was spotless & they supplied everything you could possibly need! There was even firewood ready to go in the fire pit & everything you need to make smores over the fire! Felt very comfortable & at home. Would highly recommend booking this place & will definitely be returning again!
Excellent everything

My sister and I have stayed at many Airbnb’s as we do love to travel… This was the absolute BEST! The amenities were plentiful! We always have to find a Walmart to stock up on things that are needed but not usually provided. We needed absolutely nothing but food here! We were welcomed to an amazing snack basket that included water. The place was spotless. A wonderful view of the lake just out the sliding doors. We even caught a fish! The beds were comfortable and beautifully made. So spacious and cozy. Wonderfully decorated. I absolutely cant say enough about this beautiful home. The hosts were responsive and all went so smoothly. I will definitely be a regular at this location. If you are looking for a relaxing stay with all the needed amenities and a beautiful view then this is the place for you. I will be booking again for the spring and summer. This is by far the best stay ever! I absolutely LOVE this place! My sister, her husband and my fiancé and I were very impressed.

This is a very charming cabin on a beautiful grounds that’s usually used as a wedding venue. Do be sure to read the description carefully, as it is on the rustic side. Perfect if that’s what you’re looking for. Consider bringing a sleeping bag or liner, as the flannel sheets might be a little itchy for those with sensitive skin. Also, typing the address into Google didn’t bring me to the right place, but typing in the name of the venue did. So just be aware of that. Google map estimates are also generally off for more out-of-the-way areas such as this one. Other than that, it was a great day. Joan was very helpful and available, and easy to reach. The view from around the cabin is beautiful, and there were trumpet or swans in the lake! Overall, a wonderful stay for a weekend getaway.
The cabin is adorable and charming and spotless. So quiet and serene- exactly what I was looking for.
What a great place! Exactly what I needed, a great place to unplug and relax for a bit. will definitely be back again in the future.

This place is truly amazing. It's peaceful and picturesque. I immediately felt "right at home " when I pulled in at night since the lights were on in the cabin. It's comfortable and cozy. I only stayed one night and planning to return this summer. The hosts are responsive and thoughtful. It provides you an opportunity to go back in time when things were simpler
We enjoyed our stay. The cabin offers a rustic charm yet close to home. Very clean and comfortable.

There is not much else to say about the Springbrook Log Cabin other than it exceeded expectations in every way. Even in the dead of winter, the property is beautiful and if peace and quiet is what you're looking for, this place has it in spades.
I would love nothing more than to return one day when the trees are full and the fields tall. I expect it would be a sight to behold and an even more pleasant stay.

Very quiet and peaceful place, a beautiful wooden house. Large territory, lake. The house has everything you need. We especially liked the fireplace. The toilet is outside, but it wasn't a big problem. Thank you for a wonderful vacation!
Wonderful hosts!
The cabin was very comfortable and warm even with near zero temperatures outdoors. A very comfortable and peaceful cabin to stay in!
Again, amazing
Had a great time staying here again, Joan and Bill treated us with the utmost hospitality. Amazing
Wonderfully calm, beautiful grounds to walk with swans & ducks! Cabin was very cozy- loved the ease of the fireplace. Perfect for a 2 night stay
We had a great time staying in this cozy cabin. The surroundings were stunning as well. A perfect spot to unplug and spend some quality time together.
Lovely, idyllic spot. Joan was very responsive and gave us everything we needed.
Its my husband and Is favorite getaway . So beautiful and thr lake view is amazing. Definitely worth the trip everytime!
Really nice, creative space

The cabin is magical and can’t be fully appreciated until you walk through the door. A fire in the fireplace, cozy blankets everywhere, a bed you never want to leave and a great sofa bed! Then there is the porch overlooking the pond, barn, and endless farm fields.
Then, there is the nicest outdoor bathroom I’ve ever seen! It was actually fun to use, and added to the adventure! The cabin is simply gorgeous in it’s simplicity, but with all the supplies that make the stay so convenient. It was a bit challenging to find, but the host at the house was lovely and helpful.
I would love to return in the winter.
My only complaint was that I didn’t book this for longer. What a dream.
Beautiful property and cabin!!

Due to a happy accident, we had to find a place last minute and Joan’s place came up. It ended up being absolutely ideal for my wife and I, who love the outdoors and old buildings, historic cabins, and open spaces. It’s difficult to describe how delightful this cabin was for us. We actually loved the relative primitiveness of the outhouse and the well pump. The interior was absolutely wonderful, the loft and the bed were cozy and quaint, and the furnishings and gas fireplace just pulled it all together and made it perfect. We would absolutely love to stay there again! If you’re wondering about a shower or running water, the main house is open for guests to come and shower. So we took advantage of that as well, and had everything that we needed for a wonderful stay!

This cabin was just the experience we were looking for! The cabin had to be the cleanest cabin we had ever stayed in with the best outhouse design we have seen yet! Everything was comfortable and we found ourselves soaking in the attention detail everywhere we looked! We were in awe of the beauty that surrounded us on the property and hope to return for a longer visit soon!
Beautiful cottage and location. Highly recommend!
This was an amazing romantic getaway for me and my girlfriend. The property is breathtaking and the tour was incredibly interesting. Hope to make it a yearly occasion.
Joan & her husband Bill went way above and beyond to make sure our stay was amazing! They helped to make sure that all of our needs were met and were such a great part of our adventure!!

What a unique and absolutely gorgeous property. We were impressed from the moment we drove down the cornfield surrounded driveway and onto the sprawling grounds of green rolling fields of nicely maintained grass and ponds with swans and pretty fountains. The 1850’s cabin with covered bridge was like a trip back in time to a fairytale land. The owners Joan and Bill were nice, accommodating and fun. Bill was even generous enough with his time to offer us a tour of the amazing venue, including the barn, kitchen and some other accommodations on the property., which we took him up on. We would love to come back and try the new Log Cabin in the woods someday! It wasn’t a problem for us, but do consider the fact that the property is quite a ways out in the countryside, and the cabin we stayed in has steep stairs that may be a challenge for some.
Perfect and quiet little getaway from the city. We definitely recommend this spot.
You just cannot beat sitting in a rocking chair, on the front porch of a cabin, next to a pond, in a private setting. We had a very enjoyable time there, and we're glad we came.

The Springbrook estate was by far one of my favorite ARBNB experiences yet!! Absolutely beautiful estate with ponds everywhere and a tranquil gardens!! We were visiting for my brothers funeral and was given permission for a late check out the next day to accommodate our funeral plans. It was a perfect oasis set in nature to mourn the beautiful man we lost. Absolutely perfect!!

What a lovely, tranquil and extremely peaceful stay—perfect for a getaway in rural Wisconsin. The cabin itself was perfect (exactly as described, very clean & comfortable, plenty of water provided). On top of that, Joan & Bill were extremely kind during check in and when running into them while on a walk touring the property—their hospitality and the kind people they are made it feel like we’ve known them for years. Highly recommend this stay, nothing but good things to say about it. Being able to disconnect in such a peaceful environment was so refreshing.

The cabin was truly special. It was quiet and peaceful. I felt comfortable staying there as a single traveler, which is what is imporatant to me. Even though the cabin had no plumbing, the availability of a warm shower was perfect. I will definitely stay again. Would love to stay in the winter as well.
Beautiful setting, charming lodging. It was nice to sit on the porch overlooking the pond and it was a treat that there was wood ready to go in the firepit
We had the best time! The cabin was beautiful and the host was so kind. We would love to come back!

Stayed 1 night for a quick getaway for my boyfriends birthday. Peaceful and beautiful grounds and very nice hosts! Easy check in, responsive to messages/texts and the cabin was exactly as described. Clean, cozy and well taken care of. The bed was comfortable and the linens smelled fresh! the front porch rocking chairs were great and the coffee selection was nice (kcup style) the cabin was cool and comfortable. Access to the toilet was 10 steps to the back of the cabin.
The wildlife was fun to watch and the peaceful pond was nice to view.
We did tour the grounds and venue just out of curiosity and it was stunning!!! I'm sure anyone looking for a fairytale wedding would love it.
It was a great combination of quiet and disconnected mixed with modern amenities. Perfect for a couple to take a night or two away! Naturally romantic and organicly sereen. We ejoyed our stay and hope to go back again someday!
The most serene place in Wisconsin & Illinois area. Perfect to unwind, contemplate or just relax. Beautiful swans and surrounding.
beautiful stay, wonderful hosts

This was my third stay and it was amazing as always. A very peaceful, distraction free environment to rest and relax. Hard to believe I only drove an hour from home to feel transported to a simpler time. Thank you Joan ❤️

This cabin was perfect! We had an amazing stay, and Joan was extremely kind and proactive in making sure we were comfortable and having a good time. The surrounding land is beautiful, this was such a peaceful getaway. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to slow down for a weekend!
This was an awesome experience for me and my wife. We definitely will be back again.
Just like in the pictures. Very nice. There is a generator inside the house and its sound accompanies you throughout the stay
The place is great! Our second time coming and it is beautiful to see how it changes with the seasons. Will be coming back!!!!!
Absolutely beautiful, my boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay. Definitely going to recommend to others. And hope to be back soon! You won’t be disappointed.
I brought my wife to this amazing cottage for her birthday and the scenery was absolutely amazing! One night was definitely not enough to take in the amazing scenery and the cozyness of the cottage!
Had the most beautiful little weekend getaway with some friends! Beautiful and cozy cabin that made me wish I lived in the middle of the woods! Highly recommend :)
Beautiful, peaceful, and cozy stay where time slows and connection is fostered.
The property is beautiful and the cabin was very nice.
we had a great stay
We had a wonderful time at the log cabin! We loved how peaceful it was and it was the perfect backdrop for our engagement! We will certainly be coming back.
Definitely coming back again! Super helpful hosts. Recommend it 100%!
Wonderful cottage - can’t wait to come back!
I would highly recommend this to anyone that loves a beautiful wood setting, with a creek. Beautiful place to take a romantic walk .

This cabin was so charming! Everything about it was very cozy, and the grounds are beautiful! The only downer is the lack of indoor plumbing, but the outhouse is insulated so it wasn't as cold as I expected. Another thing to be aware of is that they have an event space across the pond, so it didn't feel as secluded as I had hoped. Would definitely suggest going on a weeknight if you're looking for a quieter night. But overall, it's a really great experience.
beautiful peaceful getaway
Great spot, a little pricey for not having a shower in the cabin, but everything else outweighs that. Very beautiful at sunset.

This cabin is absolutely spectacular, so pretty, really unique with the loft. Everything is thought of for you in the check-in and our process, lots of life around the cabin (frogs!). The property it’s on is beautiful. I’ll be back here!

This 1850’s cabin was the perfect fit and location for us while we visited the Horicon National Wildlife Refuge. We loved having the pond right next to the cabin. We saw some deer, a pair of green herons, great blue heron, swallows, blue jays, frogs and saw some sandhill cranes flying over. Their is also a majestic pair of mute swans on the property’s ponds. The covered bridge next to the cabin makes for a beautiful photo backdrop. Added bonus was the rocking chairs under the covered porch. Makes for a perfect spot for your morning coffee. The outhouse is super close, within feet of the back door of the cabin. It’s clean & easy to use. Showers are available in the main white house where you stop when you first arrive. Their is also a cabinet inside the cabin with some washcloths and hand towels inside. We will try and stay here again when visiting the Horicon area.

Absolutely gorgeous facility.
So peaceful, comfortable and homey!
Would come back again.
10/10 can’t wait to come back. So many little frogs hoppin around.
This is a very warm and cozy cabin for someone looking for a step back in time without giving up most modern conveniences. Great porch on a little pond for watching stars at night.

The renovated 1850s cabin is in beautiful condition in a secluded area on the edge of a pond over the river on a wooden bridge and set in the woods. Very quiet and tranquil, beautifully maintained and decorated with some period pieces. Our tour by Bill of the amazing and huge barn made us wish we were planning a wedding or anniversary. They have thought of everything and they will be there for a long time. Don’t miss it!
Loved the cabin, and the owners are excellent and very attentive. Great location!
Pictures don’t do Justice! The perfect getaway!
Absolutely stunning property! The cabin is perfect to unwind & has everything you need. Its quiet & the porch is great to listen to the frogs in the pond at night.

Rustic indeed - and lots of wildlife. Cranes, swans, deer...it was a pleasant stay!
As you might expect, you will need bug spray
Beautiful log cabin just like Little House on the Prairie!! My husband and I will definitely want to return !!

This is a terrific find! A quiet, restful spot that allows one to step back to early days of our ancestors It is super quaint, very clean, very well stocked with everything you could need. Even though there is no running water in the home Joan had water in the fridge for drinking & hand washing. The outhouse is just a few feet out the back door. A bucket of water easily flushes the stool. The property is picturesque. If you are looking for peace, quiet, restful, nature, this is the place for you!
We went to Chancey's Bar & Grill just a couple minutes away & had really great food . This place earns a golden ticket!
A lovely stay! Very clean and enjoyable.

Perfect gem. We enjoyed exploring the property and seeing the wildlife. The cabin was very cozy and outhouse was a breeze to use. I was nervous about it, but it was clean and easy to use. We hope to be back for a longer stay!
We enjoyed the solitude and beautiful space!
What a breathtaking stay. This is definitely a must. Until u see this place with your eyes you can’t let this stay slip by.
Pictures d not do this place justice. Absolutely stunning!

If you are looking for peaceful and quiet..an opportunity to force yourself to slow down and commune with nature…this is where you want to be!
Close enough to a large town that if you forget something you can go get it yet far enough that you will not hear another vehicle or person for miles.
This cabin was exactly as pictured and described. It was a perfect amount of space for two people. Cooking was easily accomplished indoors on the stove/microwave as well as at the campfire! We brought everything we needed because I was not 100% sure of what would be in the kitchen but they did think of everything down to a wine bottle opener! You do need your own campfire equipment though.
Being right next to the water was perfect and two trees held our hammock to enjoy the view!

Absolutely perfect place!! We loved how quiet and peaceful it was. Even though there was an event that evening it didn’t bother us. The property is amazing and the house is the most quaint, adorable cabin. Loved the simplicity of it! Will definitely stay there again!!
Beautiful cottage on a great property.

We had such a nice time at the cabin. It was great spending the night in such a beautiful, peaceful, and comfortable piece of history. The cabin was extremely clean and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay.
A lovely little spot, very clean and private.

We had such a nice time staying overnight at the cabin! It’s a fun glimpse into what it could have been like living in a wisconsin log cabin next to a lake - with great modern conveniences such as electricity and a coffee maker ;-) It’s a great little escape and the grounds are just gorgeous. We brought our food and cooked it over the fire pit with our own cast iron skillet and had a lovely night by the water. Check-in is super easy if you follow the instructions which I really appreciate. Sometimes check-in can be a hassle but this one was great. Thanks again. Will return
Cute and cozy! Exactly what we needed for a weekend away!
It was a beautiful and peaceful cabin! Unbelievably cozy and perfect for a getaway.
We had an amazing experience. We have definitely created so many life time memories. Lovely place.
Quiet and cozy. We appreciated the fireplace, the extra quilts, the coffee, and the games. Easy check-in. Lovely place for us to reconnect as a couple.
My husband and I stayed here for a little winter getaway and it was wonderful! The cabin had everything we needed for a cozy night in and we loved this unique throw back in time experience.

We had such a lovely stay at this cabin! A great place to disconnect in nature. The log cabin is really charming and the surrounding grounds are beautiful.
Bill was very kind and helpful when our car battery died.
The brunch on Sunday is highly recommended!
We will be back!
Very interesting place to stay. We enjoyed the fireplace, the Wisco supper club, and hiking at the Horicon Marsh.

My cousins and I stayed here for an overnight to celebrate my birthday and we had an incredible time! The cabin and property truly felt like we were staying in a winter wonderland :) The cabin is perfectly cozy and warm, the fireplace is fantastic, and the views are a dream. My only note to future guests would be to plan ahead on meals the best that you can. There is an oven, microwave, and refrigerator, but without running water, doing the dishes was a bit challenging. It was all part of the experience, we just would have pre-cooked a bit more had we thought through that. Overall we had a wonderful time and are excited to visit again!
Great host & great place!
Great place for a quiet, relaxing getaway.
Absolutely loved this cabin! We were super happy about how the outhouse had a heater keeping it warm in this cold weather. Very thoughtful
Great quiet getaway.
Great location!
This place is amazing. Just book it.
We really enjoyed our stay on their beautiful property.
If you’re looking for serenity, beautiful grounds to walk around, some breathtaking views you will love Springbrook!

Loved the rustic beauty! We didn't mind the outdoor privy since we are adventurous. :)This place made our imaginations go wild thinking of people living in cabins over a hundred years ago. Beautiful setting and well lit too.
You can publish my personal comments for this.
Just a beautiful cabin , pictures don’t do it justice. We can’t wait to come back ❤️

Came by myself for some reflection and solitude. It was wonderful, peaceful, energizing and just what the doctor ordered. Already booked another another stay with for a Girl's weekend! A gem in our backyard.

Really enjoyed our stay at this cute little cabin. It was very clean and comfortable and everything was as expected. I gave it a 4 instead of 5 because it is a bit overpriced in my opinion. Besides that everything was great.

The cabin is lovely and the views on the property are stunning! The farm has several other Airbnb’s and an event space so it’s not quite as secluded as you might think from the photos. Everything is spaced out so this didn’t take away from the experience. The cabin is very clean, has full electricity, AC and cable tv. The out house has a modern toilet with water and extra buckets of water to manually flush. The refrigerator was stocked with bottled drinking water and jugs of distilled water. Overall great experience!
Had a great stay at this cozy cottage!
We had a blast!! The setting is so beautiful and the cabin is a really cool throw-back to an earlier time. We'll definitely be returning.
It was a wonderful and delightful place to stay!
Beautiful place:) can’t wait to return
Beautiful cabin, and interesting property. Incredibly quiet and private, it provided a moment of peace during our cross country road trip!
Perfect little get away
Had a great stay. Very quiet and a nice place to get away for a few days.

This cabin is an absolute gem and if anyone has the opportunity to visit Joan & Bill’s property, I highly recommend doing so! I spent all afternoon just walking around their beautifully landscaped historic grounds, daydreaming of times past . The hosts Joan & Bill were great company as well! ☺️ Thank you both!! Looking forward to coming back again soon! ☺️☺️
The cabin was so cute. Lovely stay!!!

What an absolute gem not far from home! You get the feeling you are truly “out there” without traveling too far up north. The historic grounds that the cabin are on are absolutely gorgeous! Joan and her husband went out of their way to ensure our stay was as pleasant as possible! We will absolutely be staying here again! If the cottage is a available, don’t hesitate to book it!!
The cabin was even better than we had hoped for! It was perfect in every way. Joan was very helpful and quick with responses. Would definitely recommend this beautiful place!

Everything about this stay was perfect! The cabin is even better than I imagined it to be. The view was wonderful and peaceful. We were really about to relax and enjoy being with each other. There wasn’t much service which was perfect to disconnect. It was a hot summer weekend, but the AC made it easy to sleep at night. You can’t go wrong with booking a stay here! Joan was super helpful and allowed us an early check in as well.
Beautiful stay!
Relaxing place to getaway. The grounds are beautifully maintained.
Joan and her crew were very inviting and even came by to mak sure we knew we could reach out any time. A lovely little getaway that's not too far from people!
This place is magic. Only an hour away from Milwaukee and it feels like another world.

We rented all the Airbnb’s they operate during our wedding weekend on the property. Everyone staying had nothing but good things to say and we were so happy with how everything turned out. I would recommend Springbrook to anyone. The cozy cabin was an awesome ambiance to come home to after a long, exhausting wedding celebration. Will be returning for anniversaries to come!

They were so welcoming and hospitable.
Awesome venue and the cottage we stayed in was perfect!
We will definitely be back!
Beautiful propert, glad we walked around before it got dark. The cabin was so cozy, even on a chilly spring night!
Would highly recommend staying at this charming cabin. The hosts have excellent communication and have curated an experience that is worth your time.
Unique and comfortable place! Definitely worth the trip and break from city and internet life!

A nice and quick trip from Gurnee, IL. Seating by the porch to watch the sunset right outside the cabin was my favorite activity. It's a picture perfect scene. We didn't have any issues with our sleeping condition or anything during our stay. The kitchen have stove, fridge and microwave which is great to store and heat up our food. The downside is they don't have running water or even water in a barrel where we can fetch water to wash our dishes. May be in the future that is something they can add on. They provided drinking water though, which we used a gallon to brush our teeth and wash our face :) All in all it was a nice experience!

Mic better than photographed. The cabin was great and very cozy. It was clean, inviting, and much larger than it appeared in the photos. What I believe was once a two story cabin, has been converted into a loft which gives the living room at least 30ft height, if not more. This is a great use of the space and created a very open feeling. Great stay, highly recommend.

Joan and Bills cabin in the woods was wonderful. It was within an hour of Madison, spent the second day at devils lake before driving home. The place was even better than pictured. The one negative is that there’s no running water but if you are going for a short trip you would be totally fine. They supply fresh water and we brought bottles too. The cabin faces sunset over their pond— add some good music and a glass of your fave beverage and it’s the perfect romantic night. The stars were insane . We woke up and walked down the road to catch sunrise in the field just outside of the woods. Couldn’t have asked for a better stay. The only thing I suggest is for a DVD player to be installed :) it’s the perfect place to cozy up and watch an old hugh grant rom if you’re just there for a girls night. Another thing, I suggest bringing groceries and a speaker— the town close by doesn’t have the most options if you’re looking for semi healthy. Overall— amazing stay. Would 100% come up again
Lovely cabin

My husband and I had a wonderful Valentine's Day getaway at Joan's cabin. The cabin was so incredibly charming - we loved the rustic feel but also appreciated the modern amenities like the tv and fireplace. Most importantly - the hospitality we received from Joan's husband Bill was incredible - after taking a wrong turn and getting stuck in the snow about a mile from the cabin, Bill found us and spent over an hour shoveling and pushing to help us get out. Our one night stay would have definitely been ruined if not for his kindness. That is the kind of hospitality that was never expected but speaks volumes to the kind of hosts they are!
Joan was very responsive during our stay! During a below zero night, the cabin kept us warm and cozy. It was such a great weekend getaway.

The 1850's cabin was IDEAL for a night away, even in the bitter cold of Wisconsin winter (0 degrees!). The cabin was cozy, set in a beautiful secluded space, and adorably appointed. Excellent! Very beautiful spot and cozy cabin.
The cabin is beautiful and well maintained. We loved it!
The cabin was exactly as described and Joan was an excellent host. My fiancé and I really enjoyed our stay at the quaint cabin with beautiful scenery on a snowy night. Zach Eshelman
This place is awesome! So beautifully decorated and warm
Great cozy place! Relaxing spot to read and write. Definitely want to visit during the summer.
The place was the perfect place to escape from the cities for a couple days!
We enjoyed our stay very much. A great place to hit the reset button. We arrived late due to a gnarle snow storm but the snow added to a perfect secluded setting. We will be back!

Great scenery, fresh snowfall, in a quiet setting. Joan was not wearing a mask when she invited us inside to her house to sign the guestbook, nor when we dropped off the keys. My wife and I came to the cabin for a quick getaway and we wished we could have stayed longer. We both felt that it was a great place to reconnect with each other. It definitely gives you the feeling of being secluded but you also have the conveniency of everything you need within a 10 minute drive. We will definitely becoming back in the future.
It was fun to experience a cabin with no running water and an outhouse! Pleasantly surprised that the outhouse was heated- a nice touch!

The cabin was very clean and so charming. Beautiful views of the pond and lovely grounds to walk. The gas fireplace added a nice glow to the room and kept us warm throughout our stay. Would love to return in the future!

This cabin was amazing! We went when the first snow fell and let me tell you it made the setting even more special! The cabin was better than expected and the view of the pond was great in the morning. The hosts were very responsive and hospitable! We will be back.
Snuck away as a quick, cozy getaway for our anniversary. It was perfect. Lights were on, very welcoming. It was just what we wanted.
Beautiful and peaceful.
The perfect place for a cozy weekend. Enjoyed every minute.
Me and my fiancé loved this place! It was very luxurious but yet affordable. In my opinion this place was under priced it was sooo amazing. Definitely coming again ♥️
A modernized outhouse... you have to experience it to understand, but describes it perfectly. True delight all around.
One of the most charming places I've been to. It was hard to leave. Book this dreamy place for your next vacation .
Great stay!

This cabin provided us a wonderful weekend getaway. As other commenters have mentioned, the inside was bigger than expected, especially the loft! Very cozy and the fireplace worked well for heat. Lovely scenery and always felt safe. My only suggestion would be to get some shades for the windows for privacy, but overall a great stay!
If I could give it 10 stars I would. The whole place is so beautiful! The pictures do not and probably can not do it justice. Just Lovely!

The cozy cabin is my all time favorite for privacy and "me" time. It has just what I need and nothing that I don't which helps limit distractions. The property abounds with glorious beauty and thoughtful care. Two beautiful swans graced the pond just steps from the cabin's door. The owner's passion for this treasure is evident, especially if you are curious about history. Each time I stay is such a pleasure, whether over night or just for a day.

This restorative stay was exactly what we needed. Just steps from the door, the pier with seats overlooking the pond was a delightful way to spend a lazy Saturday.
The bonfire and a brisk breeze kept the mosquitos away for a lovely, stargazing evening.
The cabin itself was delightfully rustic. It is exactly as described. Thanks!

The photos you see do not even come close to capturing how beautiful this place is.
The loft is much bigger than it looks. The ceilings are nearly 20 ft at the peak near the fireplace. Joan & the others I spoke to were the most helpful people. The property is so gorgeous & I hope to return soon.

This is a wonderful quiet location. If you want to get away . More of a glamping experience. Very rustic interior except for the tv, couch’s etc,. All the amenities you need oven , microwave, coffee maker but no running water ( but they supply that). Beautiful serene ground well maintained. Close to Beaver Dam and Horicon. A true quiet getaway to unwind!

This place was wonderful! The cabin is super neat and the entire grounds are lovely. The cabin had everything that my wife and I wanted--beautiful views, a pond, a campfire pit, and the electricity was a great bonus. It was a wonderful experience for us and I highly recommend it if you're looking for something a rustic/calm/peaceful vibe but still with some modern luxuries like electricity and AC. I'm pretty sure that my family and I will be back!
This is a great place to stay if you love great views and love the sounds of nature! The cottage is such a cute place and has nice touches bringing you back to the time the cottage was built.
Joan was very helpful and made sure we had everything we needed during our stay. We had a great experience.
This is a charming, rustic cabin which we used for a video shoot. It's a great space. And Joan and her crew were lovely to work with. Very communicative and helpful!
As expected, we loved the cabin and the property! The sunset was beautiful over the chapel. Just lovely!

Certainly was what I expected and then some. Takes you back to time to be very appreciative for modern amenities we have today. Quick access to get grocery items in Beaver Dam. Will definitely want to go back.
Great weekend getaway for my friends and I!

This was my first stay at an airbnb, and I really enjoyed it. My boyfriend and I had been looking to getaway for a weekend, and this place seemed perfect because it was secluded and quaint. The loft bedroom is definitely bigger than it looks in the pictures, and everything else was as pictured. We had some minor cleanliness issues, but nothing that took away from our stay. We were also provided a list of things to do around the area which was a very nice touch.

An unique experience to stay in a cabin with bones from over a century ago but updated to include some modern comforts without taking away from the charm. Great way to wake up close to nature and to see a Kingfisher swooping over the pond in the morning. Hosts are welcoming and made sure I had everything I needed. Would be a great place to stay for an overnight to Horicon. Sky was nice and dark, great for setting up a telescope away from city lights.

Great stay at Kim’s place. Beautiful, clean lakeside home with all amenities you may need for a relaxing visit. Kim was always friendly and quick to respond to any communications. We visit the area each May and will be quick to book this gem again.

We had wonderful stay at this beautiful home. We were able to find it without any issues and got quick assistance from Kim when needed.
Highly recommend!
Great stay...
Really enjoyed our weekend here with our friends. We were able to play board games, make meals, and catch up in comfort - all with great expansive views of the lake. We would stay here again happily.
Good place. Thank you

We had such a wonderful time on the lake! Kim’s place was fantastic for the 5 of us and I would highly recommend a stay here. Great bnb and great host!!

Great place for a weekend getaway right on the lake! The place has everything you need and more. Would definitely recommend.
We enjoyed Kim’s place. It was beautiful, spacious and had everything we needed!
Great place for friends to stay for events.

Our family stayed at the Beaver Dam house for Christmas this year. It was a perfect setting to celebrate the holiday together. All the rooms were very comfortable. We're so grateful to have found this house for our family celebration.
This place is amazing! The house is just as described (and I would said even better!), easy to find, really comfy, great for all seasons
The house was great, open and lots to do even for all ages in 40 degree weather ;)
Always responded quickly and was very accommodating with check in times. Was so pleased with the stay that we are using it for multiple weeks!

We booked Kim's house for a weekend getaway with family coming from Iowa and Illinois. We enjoyed the location on the lake and the amenities provided. We had a few small issues that were quickly addressed by Kim but other than that, we really enjoyed the stay!
Great place. We were using it mostly as a place to sleep and eat while we were at a local event for the weekend but plenty of space and had all the right amenities.
Kim’s place had lots of fun amenities and was set up very thoughtfully. The lake view was beautiful and we enjoyed the family friendly space.

This home is right on the lake — in summer and winter I think you’d have a great time on the lake! The view was lovely. The owner responded very quickly to an issue we had initially, and quickly resolved it. I would definitely stay here again. If you have a toddler, bring a gate for the stairway.
Fantastic home!
We had a great stay! The owners were quick to respond to any questions we had and very helpful!

Excellent accommodations in the shoreline of Beaver Dam Lake. The house is very spacious and a perfect spot for our gathering of 3-4 middle aged ex-Beavers. We will def look to stay here again for our annual get-together in BD.
Great place on the lake, Beaver dam is a great town with lots to do around the area…House is very cozy with lots of space, and games to play….We had a great stay.

The only thing wrong was we had to leave. our week went by so fast. Perfect for a family vacation. comfortable roomy beds, plenty of linens, tvs, kitchen supplies, games.
if you want to rent a boat on this lake call ahead. nice kayaks to rent from owner, nicer than mine! wonderful hosts! would highly recommend for a group. enjoyed every inch of this home.

A beautiful home and location. Water views and access are amazing. Great gathering places in the home for the group to be together. Quiet neighborhood and lake. A great place to hangout and relax. Walkable to DT area and restaurants (@ 1 mile).

The garbage cans were half-full on arrival and overflowing by the time we left. Some instruction here would be helpful. Overall layout made it easy to separate the early sleepers from the late-nighters. We had a wonderful (dam-good?) time, the home lived up to our expectations and it is surrounded by friendly neighbors.
We had a great long weekend on the lake! We enjoyed swimming, kayaking, and relaxing by the bonfire at night. The perfect place for a family getaway.

This is such a gem in Beaver Dam! Beautiful view of the lake, sunset and the perfect location in town. We came with our two small toddlers who had more than enough space to run around. Perfect location to stay for our bike race. Was easy to find with plenty of parking and a garage for storage. The house was very spacious with a wonderful living room area. Beds were very comfortable and everything was super clean. Will definitely be staying here again!

Great host, very organized and excellent communication. Place was in perfect location for us. Beautiful lake views. Would love to visit in the summer.

Kim was really nice; provided quick responses and advice. Nice proximity to the downtown quilting and sewing shops. We enjoyed the video games and sun room. Fun vintage vibe decor.
House has a great view. Was really clean and comfortable beds.

Very nice property. Super comfortable beds, love the avocado tub!!!!

This was a perfect place for our girls' weekend. We loved the lake view and how clean, inviting, and comfortable the house was!

6 stars all across, since the highest I can go is 5. I’m afraid to list what we loved, as I might miss few things. Everything was great! Our family really enjoyed the lake house and swimming, kayaking, and fishing. The town is super cute too.

Sunset views for days on this dock! This house was perfect for a short getaway. The Wisconsin summer weather was such a treat. The house had tons of space, water sports available, and any amenities you would look for.

My sister and I really enjoyed how quiet the area was. Even though you have neighbors on either side of you, you wouldn't really know it. The neighbors were friendly without being intrusive. We really enjoyed our stay.
wonderful place, great neighborhood.

My dog, Gus, and I went to Stillwater Cottage to recover from the heartache of losing two other dogs within a month of each other. We needed a change of scenery and some solace. Nice cottage on the lake. Very clean and well stocked. Enjoyed the 3 season room. Nice to have A/C on super hot days. Enjoyed the pier and being able to kayak off of it. The lake is huge. Quiet and peaceful. Easy to find. Also nice firepit in yard by lake.
Very enjoyable lake stay. Host is responsive and friendly, even let us come in earlier. :)

We enjoyed our stay at this lovely little lakeside cottage. We loved the screen porch and the fire pit in the evening with the beautiful lake view. We appreciated that firewood and marshmallow roasters were provided. Kitchen was well stocked. We loved visiting Beaver Dam especially Ooga Brewery! Twice we got takeout from local restaurants and had dinner there. We would come back again.
had our own boat dock at the house and the boat launch was only a few houses away. It was nice to get away and explore another lake. it was hot bout so coming back to cold AC was great!!
Cynthia’s house was very clean, relaxing, kitchen was stocked with cooking gadgets, felt right at home. Waking up to the lake in the morning was stunning .
Cynthia’s place was as an absolutely perfect little getaway for my girlfriend and I. If you are looking for a cute little cottage as an escape, this is the place for you! I will 100% be back!
We felt very comfortable. The place was quiet and nicely located. All as described. Kelly and Joe welcomed us with a small guest gift.

Peaceful paradise, ideal for small family in need of a retreat from the hustle and bustle. Stocked kitchen with all the necessities to cook meals, comfortable beds, lots of lounge spaces for families to congregate yet easy to find a quiet place to read and nap. Can’t wait to visit again!

We enjoyed our stay at the cabin. Everything was neat and tidy, and the kitchen was well stocked with essentials. Checkin was very simple, and we were offered early checkin if it worked for us. When we first got the cabin, the temperature was quite low inside (59 degrees), but Kelly was quick to respond when I couldn't find heating details easily. We didn't get outside as much as we had hoped because of rain and wind, but the backyard and dock looked delightful. The master bedroom is quite small, so be mindful of that. But all in all, a peaceful stay.
Very comfortable and cozy. Love the view of the lake!
Kelly has thought of everything. Very peaceful and relaxing stay.
Kelly was a wonderful host! She was incredibly responsive and the house was spacious and spotless. We had a lovely, relaxing time on the lake.
This is a cute cabin with all the amenities we needed, and more, for a really fun stay with friends. We felt right at home. Kelly is so nice and prompt to respond to questions.
The host made our stay extra special and was very attentive to our needs. She went the extra mile for us. The place was clean and spacious. Thank you so much!
Man, this Airbnb is probably my favorite so far. The kitchen looks straight out of a cooking show! You’re gonna enjoy it here.

Kelly and Joe are great hosts. Everything was nearly perfect, but there is nothing anyone could do about the weather.
We had a great time and caught a lot of fish. Would definitely recommend!!!
We will return

Lovely cottage on the lake with everything you need including lawn games and kayaks. The cottage is set up nicely with a well equipped kitchen and comfortable living room area. Host is responsive and thoughtful. Great to know this spot is here less than an hour from Madison.
Enjoyed our stay at the lake house. Loved being right on the water.

We had a lovely stay at this cottage! It was just as expected on a nice, quiet corner of the lake. Our two young kids loved jumping off the dock, kayaking, fishing, and of course, roasting marshmallows. Kelly was super responsive whenever we had questions and everything was clean and well thought out. Thank you!
Great placec to relax and enjoy the sunset. Things to do nearby if you wish.
It was a very clean house! Kelly responded fast. Would definitely stay again!

Beautiful surroundings, right on the lake. There were plenty of fun yard games, as well as kayaks and a big floating mat, as well as a fire pit and grill. The house was clean, quaint and well equipped. Great place to make great memories!

We loved staying at Kelly & Joe’s Sunrise Cottage on Beaver Dam Lake. They were incredibly responsive and helped us book quickly after bad weather at our original destination was leaving us “flooded out” of our summer plans! We are so happy with how it turned out. Their property on the lake adorable, very well kept, and has an amazing backyard, including a dock perfect for lazy fishing. We caught a bunch of huge catfish with live bait and bobbers, and we were entertained by what we think were enormous largemouth bass or Northern pike frequently jumping from the water. Our 9-year old caught two channel cats bigger than her arm! What a trip. The amenities are outstanding!! LOVED all the yard games, tree swing, dock bench, and the kayaks they provided. The lawn furniture is all in great condition, and the fire pit is perfect. Beds are good, which for me is always something that makes or breaks and Airbnb. Kitchen needs met! Would definitely return. Thanks so much for hosting us!

My family had a great time at Kelly’s place. We had a lovely welcoming package that started our vacation on a fun note. The kitchen was adorable! We spent our time jumping off the dock and kayaking. Every evening we had a fire and roasted marshmallows. Thanks for a wonderful vacation!
We loved our stay here. The cottage is beautiful, well appointed and well kept. Kelly is wonderful and accommodating. We will be back!
Very nice host and very secluded side of Beaver Dam Lake . Cottage cozy and clean.

We really enjoyed our stay at the cottage on the lake. The location was quiet, peaceful, and just what we were looking for. We enjoyed fishing from the dock, kayaking on the lake, and trips to nearby towns for hiking and site seeing. Thanks for a great place to stay!

This cabin is so beautiful! Kelly was so responsive and helpful. We had a wonderful time eating out on the patio that overlooks the lake and having bonfires. The kids loved taking the kayaks out, and this mom loved the fact that my kids are old enough to watch them take the kayaks out from the fantastic dock.
It was clean upon check in, and the beds and linens were so comfortable.
You can see the incredible amount of care and thought they put into this vacation home, and I highly recommend staying here. Thanks Kelly!
Cozy space with a great view. Good catfishing off of the dock!

This is a really nice cabin right on the shores of the lake. There was plenty of outdoor seating to enjoy, and the inside of the cabin was clean and comfortable. Kelly provides a notebook with useful information about the cabin and the surrounding area. Great stay.
Absolutely loved this place. It was perfect for a little getaway.
Well kept cottage, very peaceful location.
Great place to stay.
Adorable, clean, well-appointed cottage. Perfect for a family getaway.
We had a fantastic stay here! It was better than the photos, very well organized, impeccably clean, and Kelly was quick to respond to any question we had. Top notch host!
We had a great time fishing, kayaking, and relaxing! Caught catfish right off the dock! Nice cabin in a great location!

We enjoyed our stay at this cute, cuddly, clean cottage on the lake.
Perfect for a small family get away and will return on our next adventure in the Wisconsin area. Wonderful hosts.
Wonderful locations with beautiful views right on the lake..
Really enjoyed our stay. Very nice home in great area
This was our group's second NYE at Emily's place and we plan to continue the tradition. Her place is perfect for families and the kitchen has literally everything you could need.

Beautiful home right on the lake, very clean and comfortable. Great layout with plenty of space.
I would definitely recommend and stay there again.
Thank you for sharing your beautiful family home. We had 11 family members here for a wedding and had so much space to spead out. Well stocked kitchen and comfortable beds!!

We had a wonderful time. The lake home was great. We had beautiful weather and we were able to enjoy a fire by the lake.
The home was also very beautiful, we had fun playing games in the lower level to watching TV and relaxing in the living area upstairs.
The kitchen was well equipped and we enjoyed making meals with our family.
I also liked that each bedroom had a TV. Overall we enjoyed this home and Emily was available to help us with questions. She was an excellent host.

We had an immediate family reunion here for the weekend. It was very spacious and beautifully decorated. One family had the entire lower level with a bathroom and living space to themselves. My husband and I had a bedroom upstairs next to the bathroom and his parents had the master bedroom with bathroom. His father is disabled, so we appreciated the minimal stairs, open floor plan, and flat landscape for him to navigate safely. We enjoyed the kayaks and paddle board. We had some trouble steering the paddleboat, so be careful not to go too far away. It's not the best swimming lake, but you can. I sat in a tube in the water, and the kids swam around the pier. We were sad the pontoon wasn't available to rent. If we stayed here again, we would try to rent a boat. Great fire pit and views! It was so quiet and peaceful. We would happily stay here again and definitely recommend it!

The space was perfect and as advertised. Home comfortably fit 12 people and had a huge yard for outdoor activities. Fire pit was right next to the water for a great atmosphere at the end of each day (brought our own firewood with). Kitchen was well stocked with pots/pans/utensils to cook for our big group. Would recommend to anyone with a large group who wants to take advantage of the property’s outdoor space.

Emily's beautiful lake home is one of the best homes we have stayed in, if not the best.
Everything has been thought out so well. It's very roomy but still has the cozy feel.
Access to the lake is a short walk in the backyard.
The kitchen has everything you need to prepare a meal and enjoy with your friends/family.
There are plenty of comfortable beds with extra pillows and blankets if needed.
The home was clean, and there is a lot of house!
If we ever go back to the Beaver Dam Lake area, we would most definitely book this home again!
Very clean and organized. Beautiful backyard and lake!

Wonderful, spacious home in quiet neighborhood with very comfortable beds, well stocked kitchen (crockpot, toaster, coffee maker), nice selection of board games, puzzles & cards and multiple TV's and seating areas. The four season room was an ideal quiet place to read. Our family & dog enjoyed the huge back yard. The teenagers set up the badminton net (stored in garage) and played one afternoon. The lake was good for paddle boarding but there is not a beach area for swimming.
We did not use but the home had: a washer & dryer, paddle boat, kayaks, fire pit, grill, dog stakes and a second refrigerator.
Emily was very responsive to communication.

We had 3 year old twins that this was a safety issue so I had my son fix the screen and secured the door. We paid for the repairs out of pocket. I sent Emily before and after the pictures, and she did thank me. My dog got out when someone opened the door and ran two doors down and someone called the police. I explained the situation to the officer and he understood. We had both dogs on tie downs and leashed . This was all the first day, and after that, the week was great. The house was clean and comfortable. There was plenty of room for the six of us.
This was the perfect house to relax and make memories with my family!
Beautiful home with very nice amenities. Kitchen was beautifully stocked with all the dishes and cookware you would need. Plenty of room to spread out with comfortable beds and furniture.

We had everything we needed. We noticed the pier did not have a ladder and mentioned it to the hosts and they had it magically installed without us even knowing. Wonderful fire pit. Beaver Dam Lake is a little mucky but that was no fault to the property. We brought our water shoes and the kids had a blast. The screened in porch is such a nice place to melt stress away.

beautiful home with lots of space for a large group. The place is clean and there are kayaks and she has a boat you can rent. The only negative is that it is very difficult to get in the water. This is not a beach for little kids or elderly people. It is not a great swimming lake. The area by the beach to sit is lovely and has shade. Lots of room to play yard games.

The house was nice and it was clean. Beaver Dam Lake is quite shallow, so boating and fishing weren't what we had hoped for. We enjoyed the kayaks, but the paddle boat was broken and couldn't be fixed while we were there. Emily, as well as the property manager, were very responsive to issues and questions.

We had a wonderful time making memories with our family in your beautiful home! The house was clean, comfortable and had everything we could possibly need. I forgot my toothbrush and was happily surprised to see they had one for me! Also, very comfy beds! The views from the house are spectacular! Nice big yard and plenty of yard and board games to play. We definitely plan to come back!
This is the 2nd time staying at Emily's. It is worth every cent. Can't say enough good things about our experience.
Great stay. House was everything they said it was. Comfortable and easy to find.
It was a beautiful home and place on the lake, so peaceful and very close to the wedding venue of Fat Apple Farms. We absolutely loved our stay!!
The place was great. You can comfortably sleep 14 in this home. The views of the lake were great.
Excellent value very clean

We hope to be back again next year! Highly recommended!

Our stay went very well. Everything was clean and there were more provided amenities than we expected which was nice. Bunk beds were a little hard, but overall our stay was nice and peaceful and we were able to enjoy the time we had there with our family.
Beautiful house
The house was perfect for our annual family get together. Plenty of room and very clean. Beaver Dam is a short drive away and I'm sure the lake is beautiful during the summer.

This house is in a beautiful neighborhood overlooking a beautiful lake! There are plenty of comfortable beds and chairs for a big group. The kitchen had everything you might need. Definitely a great find!!
Great place! View is amazing!

What a great place to stay. Nice rustic decor with tasteful. seasonal touches. The location was great for our group and the Dells were very close-but not too close. Furniture was comfortable. We loved the ceiling fans! Communication with the host was great. Check in and out we’re quick and easy. We will be back.
Wonderful
Beautiful home that is right on the water and is perfectly set up to take full advantage of inside and outside living. Emily was a gracious host and I would have no hesitation to stay there again!!!
Very nice place for family get together. Excellent communication with owner.

Great house! Layout worked for our group, and kitchen was amazingly well-stocked for our cooking-in needs. Water sports were difficult as the entry area was rocky, and hard to maneuver. Would definitely book again.
Beautiful place in a great location. Place is very spacious and has a great cabin vibe inside. Would absolutely go back!
Wonderful home and grounds. We enjoyed our family get-together a great deal. Had wonderful rainy day playing Cribbage, cards, and Scrabble. Fun for all.

We had a wonderful time at the house in Beaver Dam. The house was clean and beautiful. Emily was extremely responsive and helpful for the minor questions and issues that we had. Definitely recommend staying!
Amazing property with everything you need for a relaxing vacation:). Owners are super responsive to questions, and we had several;) Thanks for a wonderful stay!

Very nice home, beautifully decorated with lots of room for all to have separate spaces. We had 8 adults & 4 small children and it worked great. Large yard for games and spaces outdoors to just relax or have a campfire. The guys did fishing and caught a meals worth of catfish for us. We would rent this place again.

Wonderful vacation home, we loved the Northwoods Decor and the Pontoon Boat is a big plus to have available. Very Clean home with large yard for fun yard games. The property manager is very kind and helpful.
The place is big enough for a growing family! We loved the pontoon, yard, home, neighbors, fire pit, kayaks, the well stocked kitchen the list goes on and on

The house on Beaver Dam lake was wonderful! So much space and so clean everyone in our group was happy with it especially the kids. So much room to run around and play in the back yard and in the basement made for happy kids and happy parents. The house had everything we needed for a fantastic weekend on the water. Seemed like we had the lake all to ourselves as there was very little boat traffic other than us on the weekend. The kids loved all the pelicans too!
Emily was a great host and very responsive to any questions I had. Check in and check out was very easy. All around it was a great experience and everyone really enjoyed the house. Thank you Emily.
Great place with an awesome view of the lake.
Our family had a great time, plenty of room for everyone. The location is great.
Nice place with a great kitchen and lots of beds. Also plenty of common space if you have a lot of people. Check out is a little early at 09:00.

This lake house was gorgeous. Great location, clean and tidy. Slept all 14 of use comfortably and with some space for a few extras! Kitchen was great! The only down fall with the kitchen supplies was that we had to contact Glenna , the Property manager, to get more garbage bags and more pods for the dishwasher. We were only left with two of each. There are three bathrooms and they each had shampoo, conditioner, tooth brush, tooth paste and soap. We had 14 guests and only 1 roll of toilet paper per bathroom so ended up calling Glenna for more TP as well. The backyard was our home away from home. We ended up renting the pontoon boat for one day. We were told we needed to provide our own life jackets so I went out and bought some & came to find out they were there provided for us. That was something we didn't need to hassle with if we were told they were already there. Renting a boat for $190 per day would make me think those would have been included. Over all the house was beautiful. The property manager was wonderful & such a great help. The check in and check out process was nothing like we've done before. We had to contact the property manager 60 min before arrival and then 20 min before arrival. She met us at the property. She showed us around & had me sign more paperwork stating the condition of the hallways, room etc...When we were ready to check out at 9 a.m. we had to wait for her to then go through the home with us again. It would of been nice to check in and out of the home on our own (after all I did sign all the contracts before hand anyways) It was a nice property I just wish I wouldn't of had to contact the manager 3 times to come back with supplies that were not stocked. The check in process has to be easier.

We stayed at Emily's place in May for a golf outing. We had 9 adults in our group. We were able to spread out with tons of room left over. The house is extremely clean and well stocked. We were able to grill out one night and use the kitchen for a full meal the next.
While we were out in the back yard we were able to meet the neighborhood dogs and some of the neighbors. Everyone was very friendly and pointed us to some good places to eat (Zigs pizza is awesome!).
This was a great experience and we are already looking to book again next year.
We stayed for a weekend and had a lovely time. The house was very nice and very clean, there was plenty of space to sleep 14 of us, and the fire pit right by the lake was perfect at night.

A very nice home which has been thoroughly and tastefully updated. And, it was perfect for our group of seven guys for our reunion as we each had a bed and we could've had a few more as well. The kitchen was fantastic. It had everything we needed to prepare some great evening meals. I can highly recommend this place.
This is a great space for a large number of people. It has a nice large kitchen to be able to cook. The view of the lake was so nice to see the sunrise. Would go back again if we are in the area.

Anne’s place was a wonderful place to get away. Beautiful view from the balcony!! Her and her husband’s communication was great. They were flexible with my check-in time which was greatly appreciated!! Thank you both!
Awesome place. Roomy , cute and beautiful views. Super helpful and responsive host
This place was great. Clean, comfy, lovely view of the lake and near downtown. We’ll be back!

We needed a get away for the night to get out of the routine of life and had a really good time! They were close enough for us to ask questions when we had them but left us alone so we could enjoy each other and the time alone without the busy of regular life. The fire pit was available for us to use with some wood even!!
The space was clean and provided more than what we needed with walking distance to food and dessert! (check out the ice cream shop down the road!! My husband loved his root beer float - hadn't had one in years!!) Coffee was in the cup board so we were VERY happy about that for the morning.
If we're ever back in the area - we'd definitely stay again!
Thank you!!
Anne's place exceeded my expectations!! Easy and clean and beautiful. Couldn't ask for more.

This place offers amazing opportunity for relaxation and recharging! We would absolutely stay again!
This place was absolutely amazing! The lakefront was super beautiful, the cabin felt like home, and overall we had an absolute blast. Would definitely recommend this place and would gladly go again.
Honestly, great time! Lots of beds. Nice touch on the water filter, no complaints!
Amazing Host this was our 2nd fishing getaway in 3 weeks Amazing location even the neighbors are awesome . The Beds are some of the best sleep I’ve had in years . Will definitely come back .

The cabin is beautiful and it was very accommodating for our family of 10. Would love to come back and stay in the summer.
This cute little cabin was a perfect girls weekend getaway. Being right on the lake was so wonderful!! Brooke had everything laid out nicely and was very responsive.

Love the place! It was very spacious and clean. We enjoy the backyard as well had a great view where we could just relax . Wish we would of rode the kayaks . Brooke was very helpful in answering my questions or giving me tips!

Brooke was great to work with and The Pine Lodge Retreat was so stunning. Wish we could’ve stayed longer!!! The house is so beautiful and everything they have done was so well done and amazing! Great place to stay! Will definitely be back!

our stay was amazing and wonderful we will definitely be back. One of the best places we've stayed in a long time A+++++

such a cute cabin! Lots of thoughtful touches such as beach towels, nightstands with built-in chargers, large ice cube tray in the freezer, printed info about the neighborhood, firewood, etc. We had a great time!

Great place. Very clean, awesome spot on the lake. Having kayaks to use was a big bonus. Nice updated touches in the cabin while maintaining the feel of a family cabin on the lake. The lodge was very cozy and had a great view of the lake. There was also easy access to the lake.

Everything was as perfect as it seemed online. The location was incredible. Brooke - our host was very helpful and thoughtful. A very tidy and lovely Airbnb home equipped with everything you need. Thanks for hosting us. Would love to come back again.
Brooke has a beautiful spot on the Lake and didn’t miss any details. She was very kind and left us to a peaceful 4 days but made sure we knew she was available. Will for sure book with Brooke again.

Nice little quiet cabin on the lake! Im sure it would be a great spot for a get away in the summer, or earlier in the winter for ice fishing. Dan was a wonderful host. Communication was seamless. We will be back!

We absolutely loved staying here! We had a very peaceful and comfortable stay for the whole week. We enjoyed walking by the lake and kayaking. We will definitely book again when we come out to visit family.

It's rare to have a place meet every expectation of the photos and they managed to exceed my expectations. Very clean, comfortable and decor was impressive. We appreciated the provided amenities, definitely above and beyond on all fronts. Both of us and the dog very much enjoyed our stay! We'd love to come back again some day, thank you for a wonderfully relaxing time with beautiful views and wildlife sightings.
We had a great stay at Dan’s place!

What can I say, we absolutely LOVED this cute bungalow on the Sinissippi Lake! We brought all 3 of our dogs with us, our senior doggo who enjoyed taking snoozes on the porch, hammock with mom, and exploring the large yard and dock. Our other 2 dogs loved running around playing fetch, swimming, and having their own little spot in the bedroom to sleep at night. The neighbors were friendly, and it was just so peaceful and serene. Trust me, we did not want to leave!
Dan, the host, is so friendly, communicative, and thorough, and just wanted to ensure we would have the most relaxing and best vacay away and we did! We will absolutely be back and I've already recommended this lovely bungalow to our friends with doggies. The cute little bungalow was just perfect, with a very comfy king-size bed, the kitchen was more than we expected, and loved being able to grill out every night and have a fire pit to round off the day. We highly recommend this AirBNB and can't wait to go back!

This home is very comfortable and simple. There was plenty of amenities and towels/rags to use. Everything was easy to find and use.
Dan communicated before, during, and after the stay. His instructions were very thorough, easy to follow, and he responded promptly to any questions I had.
The yard is large, with a beautiful view of the lake. Our dog enjoyed being in the water.
This home was very inviting, relaxing, and just beautiful. We enjoyed our stay very much.

Had a great visit at the cabin! Beautiful surroundings and lots to do (or not do) in terms of walking, enjoying the lake, building a fire, etc. - would highly recommend as a place to relax and get away for a few days.

We had a great time during our short stay! We loved the area and how accommodating everything was for our golden retriever.
We didn’t take full advantage of this place. It was a baby moon trip, normal me would have had the kayaks and paddle boat in the water. Our dog loved the open yard. I appreciated the cleanliness of knowing other people and their dogs have stayed here.
We slept good, a lot of air bnbs don’t have the most comfortable bed but this sure did! Thank you for a wonderful, comfortable, relaxing stay!

We couldn’t be happier with Corsa’s Pillowfort. The place was perfect for the 2 of us plus our black lab Beau. We usually board him but so glad they allowed pets. This is surrounded by water from each view and it was so peaceful and relaxing which is just what we wanted. Thank you Dan for sharing your home with us and making it so comfortable! Can’t wait to book again!

a beautiful and peaceful place to stay. we enjoyed the early morning sitting on the porch and listening to the frogs croak etc. really very lovely. also a very comforting space for our dogs to play in the yard with us. We loved watching the water and a bird that stood in the distance fishing all morning. Really felt happy and relaxed
Mike and Mary

Such a lovely stay for a few relaxing days.

We had a wonderful time at Corsa’s Pillowfort! It was right on the water with a beautiful view. Our dog Bella loved being able to swim and sit out on the deck with us. Dan is a great host, very responsive and helpful! Also the house is very cute and was perfect for what my dog and I needed.
Loved the area, the home and the lot. It’s just a bit closer to the next door neighbor than I anticipated.
Loved the bedroom with the glass sliding door overlooking the huge yard. Had an amazing storm that I enjoyed. Dogs were comfortable in the space and also enjoyed the view.
One of the most beautiful places I’ve ever been! My dog and I will be back next year for sure!!!

Beautiful location, amazing views of the lake and very quiet. Very clean place, plenty of room for the 2 of us and thankful for the amenities. We enjoyed sitting on the dock in the mornings and easing into the day.
Our only challenge was the lack of communication about the road construction around the house. We rode our bike there for the Harley Davidson celebration. All the roads leading to the house had signs saying there were closed. The way our GPS took us was over a road (hwy 60) that was in the process of being torn up to be repaved. The miles of large, loose gravel, uneven terrain and large bumps and holes in the road were unsafe to ride on and caused damage to my bike. Unfortunately we had to take that road once, until we were able to find a better way. The “better way” added an extra 20 mins, each way to our commute to Milwaukee. If this had been disclosed to us upfront, prior to our arrival dates, we would’ve found a different place to stay.
Fan was a great host! The little house on the lake was perfect for us while attending a wedding nearby.
we loved this little gem. so peaceful, great location with things to do. we will definitely be back.

Fantastic get away spot enjoyed the property and especially the paddle boat and also the sightings of many deer within the area and our dogs loved it too so relaxing and enjoyable can’t wait to go back again

This was the perfect little getaway where we could relax with the beautiful surroundings and the dogs could swim! The place was so so cute and clean. We couldn’t have asked for a better host, Dan was great! Thank you for sharing your place with us and being so accepting of our furbabies we had a blast!

Dan's place was amazing! I have nothing bad to say about it! Our dogs really enjoyed it too. We were private and everything was in the cabin we needed. It was the perfect distance from our place in Chicago to get away without driving too far! Thanks again for everything! I can't wait to stay again!
Dan is a great host! He answered any questions I had quickly. The bungalow was the perfect place to relax with our dog. We can't wait for our next visit!

We loved this private and beautiful little space. It felt like we had an entire lake to ourselves it was so quiet! And Dan fussed to make sure we had everything we needed and then some. We will for sure stay here again and hopefully soon! Within minutes from Horicon Marsh!
